title: Started Lagging out of Nowhere
body: Been playing League for a couple years; I've never had connection issues. About 10 days ago or so I started experiencing: delay on movement and ability commands, iceskating, and attempting to reconnect midgame. I have consistantly 40 ping, low/no packet loss most games, nothing has changed regarding my internet connection or computer.. ideas?

replies.body: Are you certain there is no packet loss?  With a consistent ping, it sounds like the issue just may be a result of that.  What do the results show when running a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader)?  Let me know, and we'll help get this figured out!
